skill.name: cognitive-twin
skill.description: Continuous business health monitoring across 13 business domains. Scores domain health, generates periodic digests, detects anomalies, simulates decisions, and provides early warning signals for problems.
skill.summary: Continuous business health monitoring across 13 business domains. Scores domain health, generates pe...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation skill with no executable code. Only contains markdown documentation defining business health monitoring framework, health scoring templates, digest formats, anomaly detection criteria, and decision simulation frameworks. No filesystem access, network calls, or code execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Business health monitoring is fragmented across multiple systems and dashboards. The Cognitive Twin provides a unified framework to track, score, and alert on all business domains in one place, with decision simulation and early warning signals.
actual_capabilities: Monitor 13 business domains with composite health scores (0-100)
Generate daily, weekly, and monthly health digests with red flags and green flags
Detect anomalies across financial, customer, product, team, and market domains
Simulate strategic decisions with impact analysis on all domains
Identify trends and provide 90-day projections with inflection point warnings
Configure custom alert thresholds for any metric across any domain
limitations: Requires manual data input for metrics not connected to integrated systems
No real-time API integrations with Stripe, Slack, or other platforms (V1)
No machine learning for predictive anomaly detection (Post-V1)
No automated decision recommendations, only simulation frameworks

use_cases.title: Weekly Health Check
use_cases.description: Get a comprehensive weekly digest covering all business domains, identifying what is working and what needs attention.

use_cases.title: Client Health Assessment
use_cases.description: Run structured health assessments across 13 domains with scored metrics, anomaly detection, and improvement recommendations.

use_cases.title: Portfolio Company Monitoring
use_cases.description: Simulate strategic decisions and understand potential impacts before advising portfolio companies on hiring or investments.

prompt_templates.title: Daily Health Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me a quick daily health check. Show red flags, green flags, and recommended actions for today.

prompt_templates.title: Weekly Digest
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a weekly health digest. Break down each domain with scores, anomalies detected, and focus areas for next week.

prompt_templates.title: Decision Simulation
prompt_templates.prompt: Simulate the decision to [specific decision]. Model the impact on all 13 domains and give me a recommendation based on current health scores.

prompt_templates.title: Trend Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a 90-day trend analysis for [specific domain or metric]. Identify inflection points and warning thresholds.

output_examples.input: Give me a quick daily health check
output: RED FLAGS: Revenue tracking 5% below forecast; 3 new critical bugs this week (normal: 1-2)
GREEN FLAGS: Customer satisfaction up to 7.2/10; Runway stable at 8.5 months
RECOMMENDED ACTION: Debug the 3 critical bugs this week. Don't let tech debt accumulate.

best_practices: Run daily health checks each morning to catch anomalies early before they compound
Use decision simulation before major hires, investments, or pivots to understand trade-offs
Review monthly strategic reports with the 90-day forecast to anticipate inflection points
anti_patterns: Waiting until crisis mode to check health scores instead of monitoring continuously
Ignoring early warning anomalies because they seem minor in isolation
Making major decisions without simulating the impact on all 13 business domains

faq.question: What tools and platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Integrates with Founder OS, CRM systems, financial platforms, and analytics systems for data.

faq.question: How many business domains are tracked?
faq.answer: Thirteen domains: Financial, Customer, Product, Team, Market, Operations, Sales, Marketing, Partnership, Investor, Strategic, Leadership, Culture.

faq.question: How do I connect my data sources?
faq.answer: Data integration requires external connections to systems like Stripe, QuickBooks, or CRM platforms. These are planned for Post-V1 releases.

faq.question: Is my business data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt framework skill with no code execution. Data stays within your Claude conversation and is not stored externally.

faq.question: Why are my scores different from industry benchmarks?
faq.answer: Health scores are calculated from your specific metrics. Benchmarks are provided for context but targets should match your business stage and goals.

faq.question: How does this compare to traditional business intelligence tools?
faq.answer: Unlike BI tools that just display metrics, this skill interprets scores, detects anomalies, simulates decisions, and provides recommendations proactively.
